org.madeirahs.editor.ui
Class UploadUI

java.lang.Object
  org.madeirahs.editor.ui.UploadUI

public class UploadUI
extends Object

Handles I/O and displays a UI for uploading artifact data to the server. The upload process begins once start() is called. After that the UploadUI object is no longer usable. start() may only be called once, and any subsequent calls will be ignored.

Author:
Brian Groenke
